name: Kazakan
description:
(Currently in development)

Kazakan is a top-down shoot em' up where you protect yourself and the Orb from waves of enemies. Waves get increasingly difficult, with a wide variety of enemies and unique attacks. Collect the souls of enemies to strengthen the Orb and upgrade your bow to gain unique abilities.

Help the Orb fight alongside you by recruit turrets around the map.  Unlock new bows, dodge fireballs, and kill bosses to gain powerful perks.
